title: Boris Johnson: "The Churchill Factor"
description: Michael's conversation with then-Mayor of London, Boris Johnson (now UK Prime Minister) on his book "The Churchill Factor: How One Man Made History." Original air date 14 November 2014. The book was published on 23 October 2014.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Boris Johnson)
